reqs.MD Vokes: Perform all provokes of a kill in melee distance
reqs.Heal Other: Crack healing and usage of Heal Other during cade cepts
reqs.Cade Cept: Cade cept at all required times
reqs.Top Lure: Climb in P1 and provoke Vorago at 36 seconds
reqs.Target Cycle: TC in combination with SWH / GStaff (no cheesing)
reqs.Recenter: Recentering P2 from any location with any walking direction
reqs.Climber: Perform a BD corner cut at the earliest tick possible and provoke Vorago at 33 seconds
reqs.Natty: Natty without lost ticks until TC
reqs.Solo Lure: Solo lure with south BD at 30,6 seconds
reqs.Hammer Climber: Apply SWH on TC and perform a tick-lossless climb with BD corner cut (reach the final platform at 30,6 seconds)
reqs.Advanced Solo Lure: Initial lure must be successful and 27,6 seconds until south BD
reqs.Advanced Hammer Climber: Either Auto Deto SWH, stalled SWH > Snap Shot or pre-Zerk > stalled SWH > Cane and perform a tick-lossless acceleration climb (reach the final platform at 28,8 seconds)

tiers.name: Trio HM
reqs: Achieve a Trio HM kill on any rotation (1/6)
apps: VOD of a successful Trio HM kill

tiers.name: Duo HM
reqs: Achieve a Duo HM kill on any rotation (1/6)
apps: VOD of a successful Duo HM kill

tiers.name: Duo HM 6/6
reqs: Achieve a Duo HM kill on every rotation (6/6)
apps: VOD of a successful Duo HM kill on every rotation

tiers.name: Solo Vorago
reqs: Achieve a Solo Phase 5 on any rotation (1/4)
apps: VOD of a successful Solo Phase 5

tiers.name: Forever Alone
reqs: Achieve a Solo Phase 5 on every rotation (4/4)
apps: VOD of a successful Solo Phase 5 on every rotation

tiers.name: Trio NM
reqs: Successful kills as all roles in in Trio
Upkeep 100% adrenaline at all necessary times
apps: Vouched by at least 2 persons for all roles (Base, Bomb Tank and TL5)
Trial hour (inspectors must be Advanced NM or higher)
VODs of 1 kill for each role

tiers.name: Duo NM
reqs: Successful kills as Base and Bomb Tank in Duo
apps: Vouched by at least 2 persons for all roles (Base, Bomb Tank and TL5)
Trial hour (inspectors must be `Advanced NM` or higher)
VODs of 1 kill for each role

tiers.name: Advanced NM
reqs: 4/6 rotations with the respective kill time
Kills with Clone Skip are required to be 34 seconds faster
apps: VODs on 4/6 rotations (one must be Vitalis)

tiers.name: NM Master
reqs: 4/6 rotations with the respective kill time
Kills with Clone Skip are required to be 34 seconds faster
apps: VODs on 4/6 rotations (one must be Vitalis)

tiers.name: Insane NM Master
reqs: 4/6 rotations with the respective kill time
Kills with Clone Skip are required to be 34 seconds faster
apps: VODs on 4/6 rotations

tiers.name: Certified HM DPS
reqs: 3 KPH as DPS in 5man+ Hard Mode
Upkeep adrenaline at all necessary times
apps: Vouched by at least 2 persons
Trial hour with inspectors holding an experienced HM tier
VOD of 1 kill as DPS in 5man+ Hard Mode

tiers.name: Certified HM Bomb
reqs: 3 KPH as Bomb Tank in 5man+ Hard Mode
Upkeep adrenaline at all necessary times
apps: Vouched by at least 2 persons
Trial hour with inspectors holding an experienced HM tier
VOD of 1 kill as Bomb Tank in 5man+ Hard Mode

tiers.name: Certified HM Base
reqs: 3 KPH as Base Tank in 5man+ Hard Mode
Upkeep adrenaline at all necessary times
apps: Vouched by at least 2 persons
Trial hour with inspectors holding an experienced HM tier
VOD of 1 kill as Base Tank in 5man+ Hard Mode

tiers.name: Experienced HM Bomb
reqs: 3 KPH as Bomb Tank in 4man Hard Mode
Significantly contribute to progressing DPS phases
apps: VOD of one kill

tiers.name: Experienced HM Base
reqs: 3 KPH as Base Tank in 4man Hard Mode
Significantly contribute to progressing DPS phases
apps: VOD of one kill

tiers.name: Trio HM
reqs: One successful Trio Hard Mode kill
apps: Screenshot with kill timer and player names visible (team members must vouch)
VOD of one kill

tiers.name: Trio HM Master
reqs: Kills with Clone Skip are required to be 34 seconds faster
apps: VOD for one kill complying with the kill time requirement of `T4 Trio HM`

tiers.name: Insane Trio HM Master
reqs: Kills with Clone Skip are required to be 34 seconds faster
apps: VOD for one kill complying with the kill time requirement of `T5 Trio HM`

tiers.name: Duo HM
reqs: One successful Duo Hard Mode kill
apps: Screenshot with kill timer and player names visible (team member must vouch)
If both players had their first kill together, a VOD is required

tiers.name: Advanced Duo HM
reqs: Kills with Clone Skip are required to be 34 seconds faster
apps: VODs of successful kills on each rotation and compliance with the kill time requirement of `T3 Duo HM`

tiers.name: Duo HM Master
reqs: Kills with Clone Skip are required to be 34 seconds faster
apps: VODs of successful kills on each rotation and compliance with the kill time requirement of `T4 Duo HM`

tiers.name: Insane Duo HM Master
reqs: Kills with Clone Skip are required to be 34 seconds faster
apps: VODs of successful kills on all rotations and compliance with the kill time requirement of `T5 Duo HM`

tiers.name: Hammer Climber
reqs: Apply SWH on Target Cycle in Phase 1 and provoke
apps: VOD of one perfect Hammer Climb

tiers.name: Solo Lure
reqs: Solo lure at all walking directions
Bladed Dive south of Vorago at 32 second timer
apps: VOD of 5 consecutive solo lures (covering all walking directions)

tiers.name: Advanced Hammer Climber
reqs: Start with either: Auto Deto SWH **or** stalled SWH > Snap Shot **or** pre-Zerk > stalled SWH > Hurricane
Powerburst of Acceleration must be utilized
Final platform must be reached at 29,4 seconds
apps: VOD of 5 consecutive hammer climbs

tiers.name: Advanced Solo Lure
reqs: Flawless execution of either the Advanced Normal Mode or Hard Mode solo lure
Bladed Dive south of Vorago at 28,8 second timer
apps: VOD of 5 consecutive solo lures
